author: slomeo
body: #### PR description: DT Shields update compared to the latest 2021 version. The update involves modifications to certain thicknesses and a material. Following a series of email exchanges and the most recent Simulation Meeting on Friday, November 8, it was decided to include only the two modified XML files in this PR and wait for their integration into a new 2026 Scenario (see PR validation Point number 1). #### PR validation: 1) In CMSSW_14_2_X_2024-11-03-0000, after editing the files Geometry/CMSCommonData/python/cmsExtendedGeometry2026D115XML_cfi.py and Geometry/CMSCommonData/data/dd4hep/cmsExtendedGeometry2026D115.xml to include the lines referencing the new mb4Shields.xml and materials.xml files, an overlap check was performed using: cmsRun SimG4Core/PrintGeomInfo/test/python/g4OverlapCheck2026DD4hep_cfg.py geometry=D115 tol=0.001 results: no overlaps found. cmsExtendedGeometry2026D115XML_cfi.py and cmsExtendedGeometry2026D115.xml are not included in this PR to let @bsunanda @civanch to decide about a new 2026 Scenario. 2) Geometry check performed using the ROOT script web_cms.cxx, which loads the cmsSimGeom-2026D115.root file generated with the command: cmsRun Fireworks/Geometry/python/dumpSimGeometry_cfg.py tag=2026 version=D115 result: all the MB4Shileds are in place (see attached picture) 3) runTheMatrix with w.f 32024.0 result: all the 5 steps successfully #### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for: no backport needed #### ------------------ tks to @pietverwilligen for the dimensions/materials updated data.
title: DT Shields 2024 update
